SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddBooksController
Controller for the "Add Book" window.
BookApplication
The main entry point for the JavaFX Library Application.
BookController
Controller for the "All Books" view, displaying a list of available books.
BookException
Base custom exception for book-related operations within the library system.
Borrowable
Interface for library items that can be borrowed.
BorrowedController
Controller for the "Borrowed Books" view, which displays all books currently borrowed from the library.
Digital
Interface for digital library items.
Downloadable
Interface for digital library items that can be downloaded.
ElektronineKnyga
Represents an electronic book (e-book) in the library.
InvalidISBNException
Exception thrown when an invalid ISBN (International Standard Book Number) is encountered or provided.
Knyga
Represents a book in the library.
KnygaCreator
 
KnyguTest
 
Leidinys
Represents a generic publication or item in the library.
LeidinysFactory
 
LibraryRepository
Manages the in-memory data for the library application, including lists of available books, borrowed books, and users.
LoginController
Controller for the login and registration screen.
MainViewController
Controller for the main menu or dashboard screen after successful login.
MyBorrowedBooksController
Controller for the view displaying books borrowed by the currently logged-in user.
PersistenceManager
Handles the persistence of application data (books, borrowed books, and users) to and from a file using Java Serialization.
Postponable
Interface for borrowable library items whose return date can be postponed.
PrototipineKnyga
 
User
Represents a user of the library system.
Zurnalas
Represents a physical magazine or journal in the library.
ZurnalasCreator
